json.schema:
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="availableUpgradeVersions">
<prop type="array" name="profiles">
<prop type="array" name="customerContacts">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="peerDbIds">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="provisionableCpus">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="supportedRegionsToCloneTo">
<prop type="array" name="whitelistedIps">

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

command.name: create
command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.customerContacts" options="customer-contacts" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.whitelistedIps" options="whitelisted-ips" group="Properties">

help.short: The geo-location where the resource lives

command.name: update
command.argGroup:
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$resource.properties.customerContacts" options="customer-contacts" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$resource.properties.whitelistedIps" options="whitelisted-ips" group="Properties">
